title: 'Trying to reconnect'
body:
Hi, so this new client looks pretty cool. I've used it for a time now. Today i got an update of the client. Now every time i login it give this crappy reconnect message (see login). Any1 can help me?

- JuulDEbeer{{summoner:4}}

replies.body: I have the same problem. Ive checked with my with my network company and they said its all good. It happend after the update.

It sounds like you're having a weak connection that's cutting you off from the game server, so it's trying to get you back in.  Head over to our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide and run through the steps to tighten up your network.  Let me know if you have any questions!
